name: jsua-example
description: An example of how to use lynx-json/jsua to build an app.

scripts.build: npm run clean; babel node_modules/lynx-parser/src -d node_modules/lynx-parser/lib; babel node_modules/jsua-lynx/src -d node_modules/jsua-lynx/lib; babel node_modules/jsua/src -d node_modules/jsua/lib; browserify -r babel-polyfill -r jsua -r jsua/lib/views -r jsua-lynx -o ./out/bundle.js; cp -R ./src/* ./out

author: Dan Mork
